Riding atop Quetzalcoatl, Starstomp receives the message.

Starstomp: Quetza, you got that? Something has to be totally wrong 
back there. Think we should turn back and report our fieldtrip?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>       He glared at the monitor and shakes his head.  He opens a com 
channel to Windlord, Termitron, and the other original Chivtrons along 
with the Taurusoids.  "We're leaving now.  We're going to fly out of 
here.  It's no longer safe.  We're outnumbered and vastly outgunned.  
When we leave I'm taking the Taurusoids to find Chaostaur.  Someone 
must contact me with the location of our new base."
